SEARCH
Package org.presentation

Class TemplateUtils

java.lang.Object
org.presentation.TemplateUtils
public class TemplateUtils extends Object
Utility class for handling template-related operations. This class provides various methods for retrieving, saving, and copying template data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new TemplateUtils object.

  • Method Details

    • getBaseTemplateData

      @NotBlank(message="Template data string must not be blank") public @NotBlank(message="Template data string must not be blank") String getBaseTemplateData(@NotBlank(message="Template name must not be blank") @NotBlank(message="Template name must not be blank") String templateName)
      Retrieves base template data. This method retrieves the base template data by loading the contents of a template file with a specified name.
      Parameters:
      templateName - The name of the template. Must not be blank.
      Returns:
      The base template data as a string.

    • saveTemplateDataToFile

      public void saveTemplateDataToFile(@NotEmpty(message="Template data string must not be empty") @NotEmpty(message="Template data string must not be empty") String templateData, @NotBlank(message="Save path must not be blank") @NotBlank(message="Save path must not be blank") String savePath)
      Saves template data to a file. This method saves the provided template data to a file at the specified save path.
      Parameters:
      templateData - The template data string to be saved. Must not be empty.
      savePath - The path where the template data will be saved. Must not be blank.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error saving the template data to the file.

    • copyStyle

      public void copyStyle(@NotBlank(message="Save path must not be blank") @NotBlank(message="Save path must not be blank") String savePathBase)
      Copies the style file to a specified save path. This method retrieves the style file data and saves it to the provided save path.
      Parameters:
      savePathBase - The base path where the style file will be copied. Must not be blank.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error copying the style file.
